dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems in a methodical and analytical manner, considering all facts and data.
Your FarTwin will rely on their instincts and experience to guide them through complex decision-making processes.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach conflicts head-on, using direct and assertive communication to resolve issues.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground with others, working together to find mutually beneficial solutions.

dimensions.label: Information Processing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin process and analyze information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thoroughly examine data, breaking it down into its component parts to understand complex relationships.
Your FarTwin will focus on the big picture, looking for overall trends and patterns rather than getting bogged down in details.

dimensions.label: Technology Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How comfortable is your FarTwin with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly proficient in using digital tools, leveraging their full potential to stay connected and productive.
Your FarTwin may be hesitant to adopt new technology, preferring to stick with familiar systems and approaches.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social settings?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and charismatic, effortlessly drawing people to them and forming connections.
Your FarTwin may feel more comfortable observing from a distance, preferring smaller, more intimate gatherings.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Process
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach making important decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will act on instinct, trusting their gut feelings to guide them in key choices.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options, considering multiple perspectives and weighing the pros and cons before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves through writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use creative language and imagery to convey emotions and ideas, crafting beautiful and expressive prose.
Your FarTwin will focus on clarity and concision, using direct and straightforward language to get their point across.

dimensions.label: Risk-Taking Tendency
dimensions.description: How willing is your FarTwin to take calculated risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly pursue new challenges and adventures, always looking for the next exciting experience.
Your FarTwin may prefer to play it safe, avoiding risks whenever possible and focusing on stability and security.
